Comments_List: Professional writing, speaking with accent reduction, working in multicultural teams, presentation and public speaking
I developed very practical skills in organizing my communication, both oral and written. I also learned valuable knowledge in other perspectives of communication, like tone, pitch and body language.
Lifetime knowledge and skills. Even native speakers would benefit from this class
Systematic communication skills, including speaking, writing, presenting and reading.
Communication skills
How to speak logically and clearly

The course is full of helpful tools that are applicable to our reality as environmental practitioners. I improved the fluency of my oral as well as my written communication (information sequencing) 
I found the topics covered throughout the course to be chosen very carefully by the professor, in which he is more than proficient
It far exceeded my expectations; It was a great class!
The knowledge, skills, and insights gained in this class were beyond my expectations.
It has exceeded my expectations
Very well
More than my expectations.
Greatly
Most of them align well with my expectation.

I was expecting more an intensive english course. Even though the workload wasn't too much, it was completely applied in my daily life, so it turned out to be new abilities quintessential for my communication style.

The course was delivered in a very practical manner. Time spent on professional writing wasn't enough--it was pretty shorter than expected. It will be great if more time is spent on professional writing.
The knowledge covered in this course are highly practical. The professor offered detailed guidance throughout the course.
It would be excellent if more materials could be presented to students to practice and use in future.
The in-class interactions are effective.
Great course for anyone planning to improve communication skills and how to speak in the public.

One really big strength is that whatever we learnt was completely applicable to our reality. 
The course could be improved by having examples drawn from non-native speakers and to have a metric of far can we go with less than 20 classes in one semester.
I will highly recommend this course to anyone who wants to improve his or her communication skills. The professor, William Vance is great!
Dont think that this class is burdensome to your academic journey in FES. Take it happily! It's a great class
I hope international students could take this useful class.
Please do take this course!!!
Many useful tools that will be available for you in the future. If you are a non-native speaker DO take this course!
